entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as the boy who has been watching Lily. He is described as hot and uncomfortable in the bright sunlight.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is introduced as a witch, with Snape confirming that she is one.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is introduced as Lily's sister, who laughs at the idea of being a wizard.

entities.name: snape boy
entities.description: Snape refers to himself as 'that Snape boy', indicating that he comes from a family with the surname Snape.

entities.name: spinner's end
entities.description: Spinner's End is introduced as the address where Snape lives.

entities.name: river
